records.Name: 4 Dragons
records.Description: Enjoy these firery slots where ever you want to have a monster time of fun and winning.

records.Name: City Slots
records.Description: Have a night out on the town with these fun slick slots for the descerning clientelle.

records.Name: Havana
records.Description: Flamboyant and fun, these slots will take you to partyville and back.

records.Name: Triassic World
records.Description: Watch out for the raptors but be ready for a volcano of winnings.

records.Name: Ahoy Slots
records.Description: All ship shape and sea worthy. Get on board with our super fun nautical theme.

records.Name: Dragons Slots
records.Description: The dragon is with you when you play this exciting game from Melvin.

records.Name: Murder Express Slots
records.Description: Intrique and mystery are just 2 of the reasons to give this game a spin. You'll be coming back for more.

records.Name: Bam Bam Bingo
records.Description: Best bingo game around and still a winner.

records.Name: Pharoahs and Pyramids
records.Description: Will the gods smile favourably on you with this game. After consulting the oracle the answer is YES!
